entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
